subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Ales Kotalik had a goal and assist, Ryan Miller made 28 saves, and the Buffalo Sabres scored three goals in the second period to beat the visiting Islanders, 5-3, on Wednesday night.
snippet: Ales Kotalik had a goal and assist, Ryan Miller made 28 saves, and the Buffalo Sabres scored three goals in the second period to beat the visiting Islanders, 5-3, on Wednesday night.
